title: (x) Nextlevel Electronics Inc. - Agency, Bank Gothic {Grant, Jes�s, Dana}
content:
What is/are the fonts used for this logo?   
   
 [http://www.nextlevelelectronics.com/images/NextLevelLogo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526222055/http:/www.nextlevelelectronics.com/images/NextLevelLogo.jpg)  
   
Txs in advance for ur help.
author: rubinho

comments.content: The 'next level' text appears to be Font Bureau's [Agency Regular](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526222055/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/fb-agency/agencyfb-regular/testdrive.html?s=next+level&p=72) with a modified owercase 'n'. The smaller text is harder to match due to the size. However, based on the shape of the capital 'S', it's probably not Agency.
I think Electronics Inc. is Bank Gothic

I wasn�t able to identify the �nextlevel� type, but the �ELECTRONICS INC.� looks like [Bank Gothic Medium](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526222055/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/bank-gothic/) (my guess is the _Bitstream_ version.)   
   
cheers,   
Dana

You are right, Grant. Its Agency Regular, with a slightly modification on the "N". Txs Grant for your help.   
   
Jesus, Dana txs for your help too. Im gonna try it right now.
I was faster but Dana was more thorough ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526222055im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
Bank Gothic Medium from Bitstream it is!. Thanks people for your help.
